onSuccess.displayText: {Player} engages in a battle with the {Monster2}, using magic to strengthen his body. At first, he physically overpowers the beast, landing multiple attacks in quick succession. However, the {Monster2} uses its wings and takes to the air, shooting magical projectiles from a distance. {Player} is hopelessly outranged and can only dance to the {Monster2}’s tune, that is, until he notices a spear on the ground next to him, belonging to one of the fallen soldiers under {Knight1}’s command. {Player} picks up the spear, imbues it with magic and hurls it at the {Monster2}, striking its heart and killing it instantly.
